entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to a few rain showers near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:13 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with wet snow except periods of snow inland overnight. Snowfall amount 4 cm inland. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:13 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
